long_description: The bike-friendly Merrell Westervelt Slim Daypack has a large main compartment that carries a 15 in. laptop, a tablet pocket and a convenient stash spot for your U-lock. Spacer mesh on the back panel and shoulder straps provides padded, breathable comfort; an adjustable sternum strap helps stabilize the pack. Stowable hipbelt slides away when you don't want it dangling. Includes both an interior padded 15 in. laptop sleeve and interior tablet storage sleeve. Webbing lash-down loops fit a U-lock (lock not included). Interior stash pockets; 2 side water bottle pockets; exterior zippered pockets. Webbing haul handle; safety light attachment (light not included); reflective logo. Closeout.
short_description: The bike-friendly Merrell Westervelt Slim Daypack has a large main compartment that carries a 15 in. laptop, a tablet pocket and a convenient stash spot for your U-lock.
